{"id":419637872,"lang":"python3","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1605209405,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/419637872/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def addStrings(self, num1: str, num2: str) -> str:\n        zero = ord(\"0\")\n        num1 = [ord(cha) - zero for cha in num1][::-1]\n        num2 = [ord(cha) - zero for cha in num2][::-1]\n        carry = 0\n        res = []\n        n, m = len(num1), len(num2)\n        for i in range(max(n, m)):\n            total = carry\n            if i < n:\n                total += num1[i]\n            if i < m:\n                total += num2[i]\n            res.append(total % 10)\n            carry = total // 10\n        if carry > 0:\n            res.append(carry)\n        return \"\".join([chr(num + zero) for num in res][::-1])","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
